chapter.title: Introduction
chapter.para: Subsequent to the release of OSGi Residential Specification Release 6, an additional specification has been completed and is presented in this supplement.

section.title: Overview of the Residential Supplement Specifications
Device Interoperability
section.para: A residential gateway can directly attach devices, for example via a USB adapter, through a home network. There is therefore a need to have a unified device abstraction, discovery and control model. For this purpose, this Specification contains the following services:

listitem.para: Device Service Specification for ZigBeeâ„¢ Technology - This specification defines how OSGi bundles can be developed to discover and control ZigBee devices on the one hand, and act as ZigBee devices and interoperate with ZigBee clients on the other hand.
